name: Flowers & Seasons
description:
Flowers & Seasons

    You need to grow as many flowers as shown in the fields near each flower's icon.

    It's not so easy, because you have the limited number of moves. Whenever you use movement keys:

W - move up,
D - move right,
S - move down,
A - move left,

- you spend 1 move point. When you spend it all, you lose. If you land on some region, you change this region's season.    

    To plant some flower's seed use the key, that is shown near the icon of the flower. To get more seeds you need to pick flowers. Flowers can give you the seeds only when they bloom. Some flowers can bloom at spring, some - at summer or autumn.

    If you want to restart the level, click the key U.

    There are only 3 levels, but I hope you enjoy playing this game.

    Good luck :)
